title: Ticket #6052: Investigate using stacktraces from GSI functions
description:
When investigating issues with missing proxy files, I noticed the following error in my GridmanagerLog. 

12/07/16 10:24:17 [763789] (827596.0) SetJobLeaseTimers()
12/07/16 10:24:17 [763789] Failed to get expiration time of proxy /home2/condor//4812/0/cluster824812.proc0.subproc0/caballerocernprodProxy:
unable to read proxy file
12/07/16 10:24:17 [763789] Found job 827596.0 --- inserting

After discussing it with Jaime, he mentioned that many Globus functions return non-zero values on failure and that those values reference detailed stacktraces. He proposed that we look into these stacktraces for the GSI functions that are used in HTCondor to improve failure messages.
creator: blin
